word: F. B. MORAN: IT IS THE SAME BUILDING, BUT THE PLAN YOU SAW WAS ONE I SKETCHED MYSELF. THIS IS A PLAN THAT THE ARCHITECTS GOT UP. THIS IS NOT NECESSARILY JUST WHAT WE WANT, BUT IT WILL GIVE YOU SOMETHING OF AN IDEA. THIS BUILDING WOULD GIVE US SEVENTY-FIVE ROOMS. WE HAVE ABOUT FORTY ROOMS NOW.
